Text.Language: Ten]ho e~rok w~ Uioc Yeoc: eyreka~reh e~p~wnq m~penpatriar,/c: papa abba (...) pia~r,/ e~reuc: matajrof hijen pefy~ronoc.
We ask You O Son of God: to keep the life of our patriarch: Pope Abba (...) the archpriest: confirm him on his throne.
